relation: Corrected more underscores in field names
Changed various instances of underscores to camelCase, so they can be used in templates Also corrected textraw and textformatted to textRaw and textFormatted
Various fixes to run on GHC 7.0 and much more recent versions of packages.
Fixed bug with words like "doesn't" in titles becoming "doesn-t" instead of "doesnt" in slugs
Moved invisible span to make styling of comment text easier.
Added post specific links to left hand menu.
Added note about needing cookies for posting.
Improved feed links - every page has the link to 'all blog posts', and titles for other feeds set correctly.
Only show one of 'logout' and 'login' links, depending on state.
Removed redundant 'timestamp' cookie (it was flawed anyway, and now the cookie signing includes the expiration date)
Fixed autolinking so that < and > can be used to delimit URLs
Made login view look at 'r' query parameter for redirction URL
Added link to admin edit page from individual post page.
Added view for deleting spam words
textBeforeTable: User name is string. user(string) The specified tag by name, or all tagged revisions if no name is given. tag(name) Changesets with no parent changeset in set. roots(set) Revision
